= Alt Key Modifications =

'''Hold down the Alt key to alter the behavior of the following commands and tools as indicated.''' 

'''<br />File>Open''': ''Open ''''text files ''''in non-editable Text window'''''<br />File>Open Next''': ''Open Previous''\\

'''File>Revert''': ''Don't show dialog''<br />'''Edit>Copy''': ''Copy to system clipboard''<br />'''Edit>Draw''': ''Draw and label''<br />'''Image>Adjust>Threshold''': ''Adjusting Min also adjusts Max''<br />'''Image>Color>RGB Split''': ''Keep original image''<br />'''Image>Stacks>Add Slice''': ''Insert before current slice''<br />'''Image>Stacks>Next Slice''': ''Skip nine slices''<br />'''Image>Stacks>Previous Slice''': ''Skip nine slices''<br />'''Image>Duplicate''': ''Don't show dialog''<br />'''Process>''''''Equalize''': ''Do classic histogram equalization''<br />'''Process>Subtract Background''': ''Show background image''<br />'''Analyze>Histogram''': ''Show dialog''<br />'''Analyze>Plot Profile''': ''For rectangular selections, generate row average plot''<br />'''Analyze>Plot Profile''': ''For wide straight lines, display rotated contents''<br />'''Analyze>Gels>Select First Lane''': ''Assume lanes are horizontal''<br />'''Analyze>Tools>Analyze Line Graph''': ''Show intermediate image''<br />'''Analyze>Tools>Roi Manager ("Add")''': ''Name and add selection''<br />'''Plugins>Utilities>ImageJ Properties''': ''List all Java properties''<br />'''Plugins>Utilities>Monitor Memory''': ''Simulate 640x480 frame grabber''<br />'''Plugins>Compile and Run''': ''Display dialog''<br />'''Zoom ("+" key)''': ''Set view to 100%'''''<br />Any User Plugin''': ''Load using new class loader''

<br />'''Area selection tool''': ''Subtract this selection from the previous one''<br />'''Polygon selection tool''': ''Alt-click on a node to delete it''<br />'''Segmented line selection tool''': ''Alt-click on a node to delete it''<br />'''Point selection tool''': ''Alt-click on a point to delete it''<br />'''Color picker tool''': ''Alt-click to "pick up" background color''<br />'''All tools''': ''Show location and size in pixels''\\
